thread.title: Trump bashes Comey ahead of book release

title: Trump bashes Comey ahead of book release
text:
Trump bashes Comey ahead of book release 3:32pm EDT - 01:28 
U.S. President Donald Trump hurled a new set of insults on James Comey on Sunday, challenging accusations the former FBI director makes in a tell-all book that is due for release this week, and insisting that he never pressed Comey to be loyal to him. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump hurled a new set of insults on James Comey on Sunday, challenging accusations the former FBI director makes in a tell-all book that is due for release this week, and insisting that he never pressed Comey to be loyal to him.
